channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Family says a Mexican man shot at a Dallas ICE facility has died, becoming attack's second victim
item.description: A second detainee shot in an attack on a Dallas immigration field office last week has died, his family said Tuesday.

item.title: Look At NYT Coverage Of Comey, Trump Indictments To See How The Propaganda Machine Operates
item.description: When Trump was indicted and had the full weight of the weaponized justice system thrown at him, the Times hailed it as necessary to preserve the rule ...

item.title: Mississippi, Not California, Is the Education Future
item.description: With reading scores nationally sliding the wrong way, Mississippi and the other Southern states offer a beacon of hope.

item.title: Government shutdown looms as Democrats demand health care provisions in funding bill

item.title: Five Problems with Blaming the Guns
item.description: Gun control as a solution to spectacular public murders doesn’t stand up to scrutiny.

item.title: Democrats’ Relentless Demonizing Paves Way For The Next Political Assassination
item.description: U.S. politics is a tinder box right now, and leftists like California Gov. Gavin Newsom and Illinois Gov. JB Pritzker keep striking matches.

item.title: The Trump Administration’s Tariff ‘Plan B’ Has an Ominous History
item.description: The White House is warning of a new Great Depression while invoking a statute that contributed to the original.

item.title: DOJ sues anti-Jewish protesters outside New Jersey synagogue

item.title: The Race-Hustling Illegal Running Des Moines Schools Indicts The Entire System
item.description: Democrats are protesting Des Moines Superintendent Ian Roberts' arrest by ICE because he indicts the entire public school system they control.

item.title: A Russian Defeat in Ukraine Would Help the West Elsewhere
item.description: The struggle in Ukraine does not end at Europe’s borders. Its outcome shapes the balance of power in the Middle East and Asia.

item.title: Britain Is Turning Its Back On Western Civilization
item.description: By praising cousin marriage, the National Health Service is repudiating Britain’s Christian past in favor of its unassimilated Muslims.

item.title: It’s OK To Be Angry Over Charlie Kirk’s Murder
item.description: It’s not revenge we’re after; it’s a reckoning.
